Create Result Structure for Country Data

Source: R/wp_data.r
in_create_country_result.Rd

Internal helper function that formats calculation results into the standard data frame structure.

Used by: in_data_one_formula Uses: None

Features:

  • Creates consistent output structure

  • Preserves column order

  • Maintains date formats

  • Sets appropriate column types

Usage

in_create_country_result(country_data, variable, date_cols, result)

Arguments

country_data

data.frame; source data for one country

variable

character; variable name

date_cols

character; vector of date column names

result

numeric; calculated values

Value

data.frame with standardized structure
